TopicTitle: How Do I Install the NASA A.R.M pack

Articles.Content: Im curious about this as i really want to play with the new parts, tweakables and asteroids. i have this game on steam, and if someone could tell me how to install (or enable) this pack?

The ARM pack has not been released yet. When it is, you can install it like any other update. I believe steam defaults to automatic updates, so if that is the case, you will receive the ARM pack automatically.
Yeah it's not out yet. But I think it will be out soon!

Im curious about this as i really want to play with the new parts, tweakables and asteroids. i have this game on steam, and if someone could tell me how to install (or enable) this pack?

Judging by the lack of obvious problems, it should be out by the end of the week,
